description:
Yamazaki Kazushi is an employee at Fujiwara Design along with Nomiya and Miwako. He is romantically interested in his co-worker Miwako, but so far his love is unrequited. Yamazaki is somewhat shy around women, since he attended an all-boys high school and did not have the opportunity to meet many female students while he studying engineering in college.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yamazaki Kazushi
